title: CLASSIC FM
content:
Can anyone identify the 2 typefaces in the Classic FM logo?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121125951im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/classicfm_logo_5037.gif)

 [‹ Typophile site fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121125951/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42138 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans serif with rough ink-gaps? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121125951/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42882 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mrpink

comments.content: I think CLASSIC is Perpetua Titling Light.

Link: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/perpetua/titling-mt-light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121125951/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/perpetua/titling-mt-light/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/perpetua/titling-mt-light/")

The ’f’ looks like Bodoni Bold Italic but I’m not sure which one.
Thank you, I think your right on both counts.
